resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105775</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105775</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206705</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Secret Life of the Brain</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die geheime Lebensdauer des Gehirns</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La vie secrète du cerveau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A vida secreta do cérebro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La durata segreta del cervello</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η μυστική ζωή του εγκεφάλου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La vida secreta del cerebro</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">presents a history of efforts to understand the brain, a three-dimensional tour of the brain, optical illusions, and an animation showing how magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) works. Videoclips examine how the brain evolves and differs from infancy to childhood, adolescence, and through adulthood.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">stellt eine Geschichte von Bemühungen, das 
Gehirn, eine dreidimensionale Tour des Gehirns, optische Illusionen 
und eine Animationvertretung zu verstehen dar, wie Kerspintomographie 
(MRI) arbeitet. Videoclips überprüfen, wie das Gehirn von 
Kindheit zu Kindheit, Adoleszenz und durch Erwachsensein entwickelt 
und sich unterscheidet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">présente une histoire des efforts de comprendre 
le cerveau, une excursion tridimensionnelle du cerveau, des illusions 
optiques, et une apparence d'animation comment la formation image de 
résonance magnétique (MRI) fonctionne. Videoclips examinent 
comment le cerveau évolue et diffère de l'petite enfance à 
l'enfance, adolescence, et par l'âge adulte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">apresenta um history dos esforços compreender o 
cérebro, uma excursão tridimensional do cérebro, illusions óticos,
e uma exibição do animation como a imagem latente de resonance 
magnético (MRI) trabalha. Videoclips examina como o cérebro 
evolui e difere do infancy à infância, adolescence, e com o 
adulthood.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">presenta una storia degli sforzi capire il 
cervello, un giro tridimensionale del cervello, le illusioni ottiche e
una rappresentazione di animazione come la formazione immagine di 
risonanza magnetica (MRI) funziona. Videoclips esamina come il 
cervello si evolve e differisce da da infanzia all'infanzia, 
adolescenza e con l'età adulta.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">παρουσιάζει μια ιστορία των προσπαθειών να γίνει 
κατανοητός ο εγκέφαλος, ένας τρισδιάστατος γύρος του εγκεφάλου, 
οι οπτικές παραισθήσεις, και μια ζωτικότητα που επιδεικνύει πώς η
απεικόνιση μαγνητικής αντήχησης (MRI) λειτουργεί. Το 
Videoclips εξετάζει πώς ο εγκέφαλος εξελίσσεται και διαφέρει 
από την παιδική ηλικία στην παιδική ηλικία, εφηβεία, και μέσω 
της ενηλικίωσης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">presenta una historia de esfuerzos de entender el
cerebro, un viaje tridimensional del cerebro, ilusiones ópticas, y 
una demostración de la animación cómo la proyección de imagen de 
resonancia magnética (MRI) trabaja. Videoclips examina cómo el
cerebro se desarrolla y diferencia de infancia a la niñez, 
adolescencia, y con edad adulta.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206705</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105775</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/the-secret-life-of-the-brain</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
